item.title: Jason Mraz - I Won't Give Up
item.description:
Ukulele play along
I Won't Give Up - Jason Mraz
Using the chords: A Bm7 C C# D Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU or D DU U (or a combination of both)
Notes: The audio has been slightly lowered (1 tone) to make it more suitable for the ukulele
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Crowder - All My Hope
item.description:
For educational use. Chords Used: G Am C D7 A7
All My Hope by David Crowder. It’s been lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Bryan Adams - Summer Of '69
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Summer Of '69 - Bryan Adams
Using the chords: A Bb Bm C D F G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU DU or D DU U DU but try your own out too!
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Rihanna - Stay (Album Version)
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Stay on the ukulele by Rihanna. The chords used are C F G Am Dm.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Elvis Presley - Hound Dog
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Very Easy
Hound Dog - Elvis Presley Written by Jerry Leiber and Mike Stoller
Using the chords: C F G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Parachute - Lonely With Me
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Lonely With Me on the ukulele by Parachute. The chords used are C F G Am.
*Original in the Key of D
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: OneRepublic - Rescue Me (Acoustic)
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Bm. In the original key.
Chords Used: Bm, A, D, G
As performed by OneRepublic. This was a request from my own two boys, age 7 & 10. If you read this comments, they would be thrilled if you watched some of their videos and followed them.
Older son: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnXyBzSlqfs_N0Sz8EeTj7Q Younger son: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLCD1tFgLd6rgT1WzdR4paA
And if you are reading all of this, please follow my other ukulele channel: https://www.youtube.com/ukestuff As these videos cannot be monetized, subscriptions and views on the other channel really will help me out.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/JZA5jnT4brY
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The motion video is from churchmediadrop.com
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Hillsong أغنية التلال - المحيطات
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Am. Transposed down a whole step from the original.
Chords Used: Am, G, C, F, Dm
As performed by Hillsong United.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE):
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The motion background is from www.churchmotiongraphics.com.
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff

Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: The Beach Boys - I Can Hear Music (Non-US)
item.description:
Ukulele play along
I Can Hear Music - The Beach Boys
Using the chords: A A7 D D7 Em F#m G Gm
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU or DU DU DU DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Jack Johnson - Better Together
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Better Together - Jack Johnson
Using the chords: A Bb C Dm F Gm
Suggested Strum Patterns: DU XU DU XU or DU DU DU DU (X=chuck)
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended
